code: import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/sri/Downloads/bookstore-fullstack/bookstore-frontend/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddBook(){const[book,setBook]=useState({title:'',author:'',isbn:'',price:'',stock:'',imageUrl:'',description:''});const handleChange=e=>{setBook(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},book),{},{[e.target.name]:e.target.value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.post('/api/books',book).then(()=>alert('Book added successfully!')).catch(()=>alert('Error adding book.'));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add New Book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[Object.keys(book).map(key=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:key,placeholder:key,className:"form-control mb-2",value:book[key],onChange:handleChange},key)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",children:"Add Book"})]})]});}export default AddBook;
